title: Houshin Engi - Novel Updates
tags: Male Protagonist   Neet   Transported to Another World
author: Morita Kisetsu   森田季節
description: The Sennin Taikobo is a NEET who kept requesting for paid leave and stayed in his house to play game all the time. One day, Konron, who wanted to guide Taikobo to the correct path, sent him to ‘In Dynasty’ and demanded him to eradicate the fox spirit, Dakki. To help Taikobo, the beautiful genius Sadist Sennin, Yozen, the cute young, Nataku and the sporty type, Supushan were send to him. The battle between the NEET Sennin Taikobo and the beauty female Sennins with Dakki starts from here.>
